The Quranic researcher sent them to the goodness of any of the groups; The collection of a wilderness with the fracture of the hammer and the stretching of the murmur, and the mud narrated a slight wow, which is the dusty of the greater widow, which was likened to it.Also, other than it, and it is his saying: I was almost guided by the votes, when I asked the land with the Apabell's wilderness and it was said: One of it is Abul; Like a hurry, and it was said: a core like a knife, and it was said.Abu Ubaidah and Al -Farah said: No one has it as a cure as a servant; The difference is one of the people who are gathered in every face, and the chili; The separate cut.This bird came to what was narrated from the whole of the sea, and it was not a rescue, no accusation or hijaz.Some of them claimed that Hammam (P-237) is forbidden from its foundations; This is not valid, and the same is what we have taken away from the life of the animal that it is thrived and broken between the sky and the earth, and the dispute may be presented in its color, and it is from its color, and it is from it.The same as the faces of the seven did not see before that or after it.
